CustomField.description: If the Plan Requirement is one of multiple requirements or multiple levels of requirements, specifies the parent Plan Requirement. Use this field to group a list of optional Courses that satisfy a generic requirement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Plan Requirement is one of multiple requirements or multiple levels of requirements, specifies the parent Plan Requirement. Use this field to group a list of optional Courses that satisfy a generic requirement.
CustomField.label: Parent Plan Requirement
